name: Fuck This Shooter
description:
A First Person Game, and my first 3D game ever, made for Fuck This Jam.

You're a soldier. And you must kill aliens. Why? Who cares? I know you only want to kill things. Now shut up and start killing things.

And remind me to never try again to do a 3D game. Never.

Move with WASD, shoot and open doors with Space, run with Shift.
